Name: DID YOU SCARED
About the game: Did You Scared is a single-player game, In this game players can enjoy the story mode with different maps and storylines. In this game, players will face different kinds of ghosts and a good storyline. In a small provincial town, teenagers continue to disappear mysteriously. Experience The realistic and high-quality Graphics Game is in the high quality graphics with realistic effects. PLAY AS A SURVIVOR Convert Into objects and hide form Ghost Play In different Maps and face different Ghost. The player can play as the main player.
